Address.title: Address
Address.description: The Address Field to be populated with the Candidate's Address from the CV Document Format:Address IF there is no address on the CV this can be ignored

Certs.title: Certs
Certs.description: Data Type: Long Text: Extracted from the candidate's CV using Einstein's data parsing found from the Certification's section on the CV Document. Format: Write in Bullet Point Format

DOB.title: DOB
DOB.description: The Date Field to be populated with the Candidate's date of birth from the CV Document Format: YYYY-MM-DD IF there is no date of birth on the CV this can be ignored

Education.title: Education
Education.description:
Data Type: Rich Text: Extracted from the candidate's CV using Einstein's data parsing found from the Education section on the CV Document. 
Format: Rich Text Bullet Point
Institution
Qualification 
Year Qualified
Any other information mentioned like subjects, activities, affiliations etc

Email.title: Email
Email.description: The Email to be populated with the Candidate's email address from the CV Document Format: Email

FName.title: FName
FName.description: The first Name/s of the Candidate found on their CV Document

LName.title: LName
LName.description: The last Name of the Candidate found on their CV Document

Languages.title: Languages
Languages.description: Data Type: Rich Text: Extracted from the candidate's CV using Einstein's data parsing found from the Certification's section on the CV Document. Format: text, seperated by , example: English, Spanish

Phone.title: Phone
Phone.description: The phone to be populated with the Candidate's Phone/ Contact/ Mobile/ Phone Number from the CV Document Format: Phone

Skills.title: Skills
Skills.description: Data Type: Long Text: Extracted from the candidate's CV using Einstein's data parsing found from the skills section on the CV Document. Format: Write in Bullet Point Format

Socials.title: Socials
Socials.description: The Candidate's Socials found on their CV Document for Example Twitter, Github, Trailhead, LinkedIn Format: Example: LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/toddthompson Trailhead:

Summary.title: Summary
Summary.description: This is a summary of the Candidate done by the Agent, summarising their overall CV. Format: Long Text Example: This Candidate is a Salesforce Architect and has 7 years Professional working experience with 5 years in Salesforce, they have a degree in Computer Sciences and 5 Salesforce Certifications

VarDOB.title: VarDOB
VarDOB.description: The Date Field to be populated with the Candidate's date of birth from the CV Document Format: YYYY-MM-DD IF there is no date of birth on the CV this can be ignored

WorkHistory.title: WorkHistory
WorkHistory.description:
Data Type: Rich Text: Extracted from the candidate's CV using Einstein's data parsing found from the Work/ Professional Experience section on the CV Document. Format: Rich Text 
Title | Company Name | Location | Date from and To 
Bullet point of their duties, Projects they worked on, Achievements and anything else they mentioned Reason for leaving if on CV

recordId.title: recordId
recordId.description: This is the Candidate__c record and the record's ID and is to be pushed in to the recordId variable
